instruction: Design a game for young children that emphasizes the importance of safety.
output: My game would be a 2D platformer where the player takes the role of a young child who has the task of collecting safety items such as fire extinguishers, helmets and life jackets. As they progress in the game, they will encounter different challenges and situations in which they must use the items they've collected in order to stay safe. They will receive points for every item they collect and safety challenges they complete.
